name: FlightPlan
desc: An interactive flight scheduler targeted for companies who want to visualize and refine schedule for the day. Built using Python, Mongo, Pandas, OpenSky API, Amadeus API, Flask, and Folium.

name: DraftWatch
desc: An application that tracks the current draft position for fantasy football. Only works in preseason due to website's format. Built using Python, Requests, Pandas, and Streamlit.

name: StaticSnow Escape VR
desc: VR group project to simulate a static equilibrium physics lab.

name: Best Ball Advance Rate Calculator
desc: A Python application that uses the datasets provided by UnderDog Fantasy to calculate the best ball advance rate for each player. Built using Python, Pandas, and Jupyter Notebook.

name: Background Remover
desc: Python application that uses the PhotoRoom API to remove the background of an image. Built using Python, and PhotoRoom API.

name: Room Planner Perceptron
desc: Basic perceptron that finds the optimal location to place a couch in a room. School project no code available. Using Python, and Numpy.

name: NBA Optimal 5 - Artificial Neural Network
desc: Artificial Neural Network that predicts the optimal 5 players for a given NBA team. Built using Python, Pandas, Keras, TensorFlow, and Sklearn. School Project no code available.

name: Flower Identifier - Convolutional Neural Network
desc: Convolutional Neural Network that predicts the type of flower given an image to protect cats from lilies. Built using Python, Pandas, Keras, TensorFlow, and Sklearn. School Project no code available.

name: IMDB Sentiment Analysis - Natural Language Processing
desc: Natural Language Processing that predicts the sentiment of a movie review. Built using Python, Pandas, nltk, and tf-idf. School Project no code available.

name: Political Speech Analysis - Recurrent Neural Network
desc: Recurrent Neural Network that uses an input of 4 words to output a 5th word. Generated a paragraph as well. Built using Python, Pandas, Keras, TensorFlow, and Sklearn. School Project no code available.
